comments.creator: asa@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
In addition to bug 599824, it would be really nice if there were discreet copy to clipboard buttons/links for each section.  Users are frequently asked in bug reports to supply their Graphics information and a select, copy, and paste from that section gives awfully formatted text. The copy to clipboard is somewhat better but that requires editing the results down to just the section you want to supply in a bug report. 

Alternatively, we could make manually selecting, copying, and pasting not produce completely broken results. I suspect that's more work though than adding a "copy this section to clipboard" link
